bEnableFileSelection=1

I have found a fix to the "greyed out" data files problem. So if you cant activate the DLC do this:

- apply patch
- copy the dawnguard DLC files into your installation folder / data
- now, go to documents/my games/skyrim/skyrim prefs and add the following to the BEGINNING / TOP of the file.

[Launcher]
bShowAllResolutions=0
uLastAspectRatio=2
bEnableFileSelection=1

Then run the skyrim launcher and you can play.

alright guys, so to get this to work you need the 1.6 patch at: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7363212/The.Elder.Scrolls.V.Skyrim.v1.6.89.0.6.Update.9.CRACKED-P2P
and after you install that, install 1.7 at: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7501566/The_Elder_Scrolls_V__Skyrim_1.7_patch_by_T.F.K
and then you can install the dawnguard expansion into the data folder. After all of that open your skyrim launcher and if data files is grayed out go to C:/documents/mygames/skyrim or until you get to skyrim prefs. Open it and cntrl F then type "launcher" then click to the right of the highlighted blue and click enter and paste in: bShowAllResolutions=1
uLastAspectRatio=4
bEnableFileSelection=1
if there is another one of these lines with a different number just delete and then cntrl S to save.
Congratulations, click play and enjoy!
